name: Waffles
description: Apple cider vinegar mixed in silky soy milk, topped with maple syrup, vegan whipped cream, sweet, ripened strawberries and blueberries.

name: Pancakes
description: Smooth, rich vegan butter combined with non-dairy milk from our grass-fed cows raised on local farms. Freshly-plucked strawberries and blueberries can be added accordingly.

name: Omelettes
description: Pasteurized eggs, creamy butter, grated cheddar cheese, fresh baby spinach leaves, chopped red peppers and cherry tomatoes.

name: Oatmeal
description: Gluten free rolled oats, silky coconut milk, rich butter, coated in sweet maple syrup. Optional toppings include: ripe bananas and pears, plump berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, blackberries), crunchy apples.

name: Strawberry Sorbet
description: Juicy strawberries mixed with sweet syrup.

name: Berry Acai Bowl
description: Assortment of mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, blackberries - customizable by customers), ripe bananas, crunchy nuts, and chia seeds.

name: Crepes
description: Avocado oil mixed with creamy soy milk. Optional toppings: soft berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, blackberries), sliced fruits (apples, pears, pineapples), rich maple syrup, vegan whipped cream.

name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
description: Ripe banana, medjool dates, creamy almond and coconut milk, frozen strawberries.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: Soft banana, frozen mango chunks, vanilla almond milk, and dairy-free coconut yogurt.

name: Vanilla Milkshake
description: Vegan vanilla ice cream, non-dairy milk, and vanilla extract.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Vegan milk, coffee grounds. Customizable: organic sugar, vanilla extract for Vanilla Iced Coffee, or sweet maple syrup, cocoa powder for Iced Mocha.

name: Jasmine Iced Tea
description: Jasmine green tea, light agave sweetener.

name: London Fog Tea Latte
description: Earl Grey tea, plant-based milk (almond milk or oat milk), granulated sugar.

name: Greek Salad
description: Our Greek Salad is a careful selection of leafy greens, crisp cucumbers, sliced onions, ripened cherry tomatoes and olives, and our homemade almond feta, topped with our signature herb dressing.

name: Golden Beet Salad
description: This vibrant assortment of fresh vegetables and fruits comprises canary-yellow beets, sliced oranges, garden-harvested mint, crunchy pistachios, our homemade almond feta, completed with our gluten-free balsamic vinegar and vinaigrette oil.

name: Kale Salad
description: Our Kale Salad consists of a variety of vegan pepita parmesan, savory capers, mildly bitter kale, golden-brown croutons, tender butter lettuce leaves, finalized with our gluten-free tahini caper dressing.

name: Tofu Salad
description: The Tofu Salad is a flavorful combination of garden greens and produce: Romaine lettuce, freshly-prepared cucumbers, plump tomatoes, sweet corn kernels, creamy, sliced avocados, diced scallions, and crispy, fried tofu, all coated in tahini sauce.

name: Loaded Sweet Potato Fries
description: This mouth-watering starter consists of warm, crispy sweet potato fries baked straight out of the oven, decorated in cilantro and diced onions, topped with the Vegan Chipotle Sauce.

name: Breadsticks
description: Our classic homemade, buttery breadsticks, sprinkled with garlic powder.

name: Veggie Burgers
description: Chopped walnuts and shallots, toasted bread, vegan Worcestershire sauce, minced garlic, a variety of mushrooms (shiitake, portobello), steamed brown rice.

name: Veggie Pizza
description: (Standard) fluffy pizza dough, savory marinara sauce, sprinkled baby spinach leaves, shredded mozzarella cheese, sliced red peppers, cherry tomatoes, crunchy olives. Optional toppings: bite-size artichokes, sliced onions.

name: Lentil Tacos
description: An assortment of herbs (chili powder, ground cumin, garlic powder, paprika), soft tortillas, savory vegetable broth and lentils, tomato salsa.

name: Quinoa Bowl
description: Diced green onions, crunchy red bell peppers, zucchini, and olives, covered in vegan tzatziki sauce.

name: Vegan Chicken Tenders
description: Firm tofu, flour, tart pickle juice, non-dairy milk, and an assortment of seasonings (paprika, black pepper, garlic powder, onion powder), decorated in buffalo sauce (or mayonnaise).

name: Classic Spaghetti
description: Diced onions and garlic, chopped tomatoes, fresh basils, balsamic vinaigrette, Parmesan cheese, and soft spaghetti noodles.

name: Ratatouille
description: Sliced tomatoes, eggplants, and zucchinis, shredded carrots, chopped garlic and onions, sprinkled with assorted herbs.

name: Curry
description: A mixture of aromatics (paprika, nutmeg, cinnamon), boiled tofu, tomato sauce, crunchy cauliflower, fresh baby spinach, and silky coconut milk.

name: Pasta e Fagioli
description: Diced tomatoes and onions, peeled garlic, savory tomato paste, fresh herbs (rosemary and thyme), warm vegetable broth, soft beans, small pasta shells, crispy celery and carrots.

name: Kimbap
description: Firm tofu, crunchy cucumber and carrot, warm rice, ripe avocado, soft cream cheese

name: Pad Thai
description: Vegan, rice noodles, firm, fried tofu, soy sauce (contains gluten), sweet maple syrup, tart lime juice, sprinkle of green onions. Optional toppings include: lime wedges, mung bean sprouts, chopped peanuts, and cilantro.
